channel.title: PLS help [317] Allstar Scape NEED URGENT HELP!
channel.description:
please help me on how i make npcs drop stuff i got 317 allstar scape umm my npcdrops.cfg i tryied and i did this:
npcdrop = 2060 2528 1 10
and i tryed this:
npcdrop = 2060 1 2528 1
and none of them work :( maybe it does but i keep killing the npc and nothing :( i wanna make it drop xp lamps like 8% pls help me i dont want it 50% because it will be too easy so 8% is good for me pls help

item.title: PLS help [317] Allstar Scape NEED URGENT HELP!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

As said above, it is probably configured in the NPCHandler class. Try looking for NPC drops that have already been added in that class for an example, and learn off that.

Read full topic
item.source: PLS help [317] Allstar Scape NEED URGENT HELP!

item.title: PLS help [317] Allstar Scape NEED URGENT HELP!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

NPC drops are usually handled in NPCHandler.java and either one of the Item files or Misc.java, I am not too sure about which of those it is as the server I use is using easier methods, etc. The Npcdrops.cfg file only works on a few servers as far as I am aware.

Read full topic
item.source: PLS help [317] Allstar Scape NEED URGENT HELP!

You change drops for Alstar in Npchandler.java
